title: At Orikhiv direction Russian army shelled Chervone, Bilohirya, Scherbaky and Pyatykhatky of Zaporizhzhia region. Russian avia...
content: At Orikhiv direction Russian army shelled Chervone, Bilohirya, Scherbaky and Pyatykhatky of Zaporizhzhia region. Russian aviation conducted airstrike at Malynivka of Zaporizhzhia region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
